Test Name: ADAMTS13 Gene, Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) for Hereditary TTP
Purpose: To detect pathogenic variants in the ADAMTS13 gene associated with hereditary thrombotic thrombocytopenic purpura (TTP) using next-generation sequencing.
Container: Peripheral blood collection tube or saliva collection kit suitable for DNA extraction
Equipment: NGS platform (e.g., Illumina or Ion Torrent), DNA extraction kit, PCR thermocycler, library preparation kit, bioanalyzer/fragment analyzer, computer with bioinformatics software
